solution.text:
Budding is the process by which a bulb like projection, called bud, grows on the parent cell and gets detached to form a new cell
This is vegetative propagation
This is fragmentation
This is spore formation

content.text: Which of the following best describes budding?

incorrect.text: The growth of new plants from nodes
The splitting of parent into 2 parts

correct.text: The growth of bulb like projections from parent
